activities:
OneTouchPoint-CCI is a leading print and document management solutions provider offering marketing, print, mail, distribution, and eSolutions to companies across industry sectors. Information is collected or submitted on the Company website and through our web-enabled document management tool, U.Connect. This website enables clients and prospects to request quotes, order products, make requests, and register to receive materials. The types of personal information generally collected on these sites may include: 

?	Name 
?	Address 
?	E-mail address 
?	Phone number 
?	Credit/Debit Card Information 
?	Company information
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: This privacy policy applies to all personal information received from customers or prospects by the Company whether in electronic, paper, or verbal format.
